name: La Carmela de Boracay Hotel
detail: Perfect location with easy access to local attractions.

name: Henann Crystal Sands Resort
detail: Great beachfront location close to D’mall. Sky pool bar is a huge attraction and definitely is this hotels USP. Infinity pool gets the sun all day and provide the best spot to look at the sunset. John and his team as always know how to look after his guests and make sure you are fully juiced up giving no reason to leave the pool area. Typical Henann surroundings, amenities and hospitality which makes me come back every year to stay in their resorts. I have tried them all and this could well be my favourite Henann in Boracay. But... the breakfast was disappointing as less variety than others. No mango on offer, which is a must for any Philippine resort and the menu was made up of the strangest food combinations which simply doesn’t work. Please Henann... keep it simple, don’t be stingy with food options and Crystal Sands could be the only place to stay in Boracay. It’s easy to criticise when they have raised the bar so high with their other resorts. Saying that, I wouldn’t stay anywhere else!!!

name: Boracay Ocean Club Beach Resort
detail: Boracay is definitely a great place for a short honeymoon, or a beach holiday. The people are all super friendly and both my husband and I enjoyed ourselves. The Ocean Club was by far one of the best resorts located along the quieter side of the beach in Boracay. Free beach towels and beach chairs for uninterrupted and peaceful sunset viewing. Although walking back from the main parts of the beach might be a long way, but we always enjoyed these walks along the stretch of beautiful beach. The resort itself was super clean and the staff are all wonderful. Super polite and efficient. Buffet Dinners are the best !!!! BBQ menus are wonderful, and super affordable. The Breakfast spread is also very delectable, I particularly loved that the restaurant set up an egg station. LOVED IT. The resort also can help arrange for transportation (with Island Star or Southwest), from Kalibo Airport at a good price. Other than that! My husband and I are looking forward to go back to Boracay, and we will definitely be staying at The Ocean Club!

name: Henann Park Resort
detail: This was the best resort I've found in Boracay in 20 years.

name: Henann Palm Beach Resort
detail: The new Henann hotel is probably the best Henann hotel in Boracay! The hotel is totally new, it looks amazing, the rooms are great, it’s right on the beautiful white beach and the stuff are very kind and helpful! The hotel manager Glenn is great and was always around to make sure everything is perfect. Highly recommended for honeymoon or any visit in the island, we enjoyed every second :)

name: Henann Regency Resort And Spa
detail: we were on vacation because of my recent birthday that i celebrated in Boracay Regency Hotel and Spa...i only made a internet surfing for low cost hotels in boracay suddenly i choosed this Boracay Regency Hotel and Spa...which i choosed the right hotel for our family vacation also...it was a great honor to be celebrated my birthday in this hotel, the staff were all friendly and nice..the breakfast, lunch and dinner were all good...the island hopping for our activities that the hotel introduced to us were differently to the other activities we took before...the facilities of this hotel were also great...yes, the cleanliness, the ambiance, the facilities, the service were so good, from they took us to Caticlan airport to the speed boat until we reach the beautiful hotel, the staffs, they all knew what their guest wants...this Boracay Regency Hotel and Spa is one of the hotels, that the Philippines proud of...tourism industry in the philippines will be known evrywhere because of this HOTEL...

name: Fairways and Bluewater Boracay
detail: My family had a splendid vacation at Fairways! Fairways has the best spot in Boracay Island. It has vast estate that houses a number of villas, pools and restaurants and a golf course. It has efficient and prompt shuttle services. We did not have to wait for a long time for the shuttles to arrive. Fairways has many of shuttles that are one call away. The villas are nice, perfect for our family of four. The pools are majestic, esp. the ventana pool that overlooks the sea and mountains. The location is great; away from the hustle and bustle of the busy districts in Boracay. So peaceful, calm and relaxing with scenic views of the sea, mountains and the golf course. The staff are one of its assets. The guards were always ready to assist us in arranging shuttle services.

name: Henann Garden Resort
detail: we were having hesitations of booking this king of hotel but when we checked i at boracay garden, it was superb and amazing! price was ok same as hkg's hotels but you wont regret booking this hotel. buffet breakfast offers international dishes! location is very nice located at station 2 of boracay island. a 5 star hotel with a 3 star price! you will really get your money's worth at this hotel. next time you go to boracay, do not hesitate to book boracay garden!

name: Henann Lagoon Resort
detail: I must give 2 thumbs up for their hotel transfer service, journey from Kalibo airport to Boracay island is full of twists and turns, but they manage to keep track of everything and provide a smooth transfer from land to sea to land, it's highly recommended. It was a surprise for us at the moment we found out the shuttle bus to pick us up is from a 5 stars hotel, turns out Hennan Lagoon is a sister company of a hotel franchise, as a guest there we have free access to the 5 stars hotel's beach and a welcome drink at it's lounge. Staff are very helpful and friendly. The surroundings of this hotel is a bit noisy, but once you step into the lobby it become a different world, room is clean and quiet, swimming pool is well maintained. We had dinner buffet at their restaurant on the first night, food is ok. There are plenty of restaurant at the beach, which is only 5-10 mins walk from hotel.

name: The Lind Boracay
detail: The staff make the Lind a 5 star experience, they are both friendly and polite. Any time I made a request it was done quickly and with a smile. The facility is truly beautiful, a modern and enjoyable design. Cleanliness is 10/10. The concierge assisted me with booking activities on the island with recommended providers, making it simple and stress free. This is one of the best hotels in Boracay. I recommend it to anyone. I will be returning to the Lind without a doubt :)
